item.title: Re: Minor Note: Circle of the forged got altered
item.content:encoded: Main page updated with the new link.

item.title: Minor Note: Circle of the forged got altered
item.content:encoded:
Just poiting out that the page links for the circle of the forged got changed to druid:forged-hb from druid:circle-of-the-forged, so the frontpage link to it needs to be fixed

Also going to make a note to Zkaij that its helpful to make posts bringing up whenever you take actions on the site since it helps people stay in the loop, got a bit worried the page got deleted there.
